CustomField.formula:
IF(AND( Downtime_End_Month__c=11, Downtime_Start_Month__c=11), Duration_s__c,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=11, Downtime_End_Month__c=12),
(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-11-30 23:00:00.000")-(Downtime_Start_Date__c))*86400,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=10, Downtime_End_Month__c=11),
((Downtime_End_Date__c)-DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-10-31 23:00:00.000"))*86400,
0)))
CustomField.label: Downtime (s) - November
